import React from 'react' import "../../styles/booking.css" import {Form , FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem,Button} from "reactstrap" const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews}=tour; return

${price}/Per Person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}({reviews?.length})
{/*booking form*/}
Information
} export default Booking
